channel.title: Graduate College Educational Equity Programs
channel.description: Deadlines and events associated with the Graduate College Educational Equity Programs Office

item.title: Summer Research Opportunites Program (SROP) GRE Institute Begins
item.description: SROP at Illinois offers a GRE Institute for participants who will be expected to take the Graduate Records Exam as part of their graduate admission requirements.

item.title: Summer Research Opportunities Program (SROP) GRE Institute Ends
item.description: SROP at Illinois offers a GRE Institute for participants who will be expected to take the Graduate Records Exam as part of their graduate admission requirements.

item.title: Summer Research Opportunities Program (SROP) Begins
item.description: The University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign offers a summer research program that provides undergraduate students from populations underrepresented in graduate study at Illinois with an opportunity to explore careers in research.

item.title: Summer Pre-Doctoral Institute (SPI) Begins
item.description: The Summer Pre-Doctoral Institute (SPI) at the University of Illinois (Illinois) provides participants with an early introduction to graduate study at Illinois and an opportunity to work with a summer research advisor or a faculty mentor in their department.

item.title: Summer Pre-Doctoral Institute (SPI) Ends
item.description: The Summer Pre-Doctoral Institute (SPI) at the University of Illinois (Illinois) provides participants with an early introduction to graduate study at Illinois and an opportunity to work with a summer research advisor or a faculty mentor in their department.

item.title: Summer Research Opportunities Program (SROP) Ends
item.description: The University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign offers a summer research program that provides undergraduate students from populations underrepresented in graduate study at Illinois with an opportunity to explore careers in research.

item.title: Aspire - Fall Campus Visit & Early Application Program
item.description: ASPIRE is a diversity recruitment initiative designed to increase the pool of students from populations historically underrepresented in graduate programs at Illinois.
